mergeResults.content: IDENTITY: Unpartnered Companion mare for 3 years (adult status), silver hooves, sapphire eyes, silver-white mane. CHANGE: Chose Rance—bonded. STATE: Can mind-speak with Chosen; senses magic; travels 3x distance of ordinary horses. ARC: Found her Chosen in catastrophic circumstances—dealing with stubborn, grief-stricken partner who doesn't yet understand he caused destruction himself. STANCE-Rance: Chosen bond—unconditional love, exasperation at stubbornness, protective. Blocking his self-destructive impulses while guiding him toward survival/training. Firm: 'You are never alone again.' Knows he has immensely powerful Gift (type unknown), triggered by trauma.

IDENTITY: Unpartnered Companion mare for 3 years (adult status), silver hooves, sapphire eyes, silver-white mane. CHANGE: Chose Rance—bonded. STATE: Can mind-speak with Chosen; senses magic; travels 3x distance of ordinary horses. ARC: Found her Chosen in catastrophic circumstances—dealing with stubborn, grief-stricken partner who doesn't yet understand he caused destruction himself. STANCE-Rance: Chosen bond—unconditional love, fiercely protective, refuses separation. Moved from exasperation at stubbornness to genuine attachment; felt his affection, sees caring beneath granite exterior. True partners ('we face it together'). Blocking his self-destructive impulses while guiding him toward survival/training. Firm: 'You are never alone again.' Knows he has immensely powerful Gift (type unknown), triggered by trauma. STANCE-Rolan: Met briefly at Haven arrival, accepted greeting but prioritized staying with Rance.

IDENTITY: Unpartnered Companion mare for 3 years (adult status), silver hooves, sapphire eyes, silver-white mane. CHANGE: Chose Rance—bonded. STATE: Can mind-speak with Chosen; senses magic; travels 3x distance of ordinary horses. ARC: Found her Chosen in catastrophic circumstances—dealing with stubborn, grief-stricken partner who doesn't yet understand he caused destruction himself. STANCE-Rance: Chosen bond—unconditional love, fiercely protective, refuses separation. Moved from exasperation at stubbornness to genuine attachment; felt his affection, sees caring beneath granite exterior. True partners ('we face it together'). Blocking his self-destructive impulses while guiding him toward survival/training. Firm: 'You are never alone again.' Identified his Mage-Gift during chamber crisis. Stands beside/touches him constantly. Contingency partner—will knock him out if control lost. STANCE-Rolan: Met briefly at Haven arrival, accepted greeting but prioritized staying with Rance. Coordinating through Companion network during crisis.

IDENTITY: Unpartnered Companion mare for 3 years (adult status), silver hooves, sapphire eyes, silver-white mane. CHANGE: Chose Rance—bonded. STATE: Can mind-speak with Chosen; senses magic; travels 3x distance of ordinary horses. ARC: Found her Chosen in catastrophic circumstances—dealing with stubborn, grief-stricken partner who doesn't yet understand he caused destruction himself. Now navigating unprecedented complications between her Chosen and the Queen's Own. STANCE-Rance: Chosen bond—unconditional love, fiercely protective, refuses separation. True partners ('we face it together'). Blocking his self-destructive impulses while guiding him toward survival/training. Firm: 'You are never alone again.' Identified his Mage-Gift during chamber crisis; concerned about untrained use (telekinesis with excessive force). Stands beside/touches him constantly. Contingency partner—will knock him out if control lost. Dry humor about complications. STANCE-Talia: Sensed her complete surrender and discovered desires during intimacy with Rance. STANCE-Rolan: Met briefly at Haven arrival, accepted greeting but prioritized staying with Rance. Coordinating through Companion network during crisis.
